recipe.title: Mojito II
ingredients: Chilled club soda or seltzer water
Garnish: fresh mint sprig and lemon slices
instructions: In a tall glass with back of a spoon crush mint with sugar and lemon juice until sugar is dissolved and stir in rum. Add ice cubes and top off drink with club soda or seltzer water. Stir drink well and garnish with mint and lemon.
